basic.title: Basic
basic.description: A set of basic colors. Red, Green, Blue...

html.title: HTML Colors
html.description: HTML/CSS color names. These can be used as keywords in CSS, SVG's or HTML.

japaneseTraditional.title: Traditional Colors of Japan
japaneseTraditional.description: The traditional colors of Japan are a collection of colors traditionally used in Japanese art, literature, textiles such as kimono, and other Japanese arts and crafts.

leCorbusier.title: Le Corbusier
leCorbusier.description: Architectural colours in Le Corbusier's colour system.

nbsIscc.title: The Universal Color Language
nbsIscc.description: ISCC–NBS System of Color Designation: Naming system for colors based on a set of 12 basic color terms and a small set of adjective modifiers.

ntc.title: NTC.js
ntc.description: NTC.js color matching library names released in 2007. The names were collected from various sources like Wikipedia, X11, Crayola etc.

osxcrayons.title: OS X Crayons
osxcrayons.description: OS X Crayons color names mostly used in the OS X color-picker GUI.

ridgway.title: Robert Ridgway's Color Standards and Color Nomenclature
ridgway.description: Color Nomenclature by Robert Ridgway (1850-1929) was published in Washignton, DC in 1912, it's part of the public domain in the USA. In August 31, 2020 was added to the Gutenberg Project.

sanzoWadaI.title: Wada Sanzō Japanese Color Dictionary Volume I
sanzoWadaI.description: Names from Wada Sanzō 和田 三造 Colors Dictionary volume I

thesaurus.title: The Color Thesaurus
thesaurus.description: The Color Thesaurus by Ingrid Sundberg. As a writer she collected color names to dig into the emotion of a scene and create variety in her writing.

werner.title: Werner's Nomenclature of Colours
werner.description: All colors from the book Werner's Nomenclature of Colours collected and described in the late 18th century

windows.title: Microsoft Windows Color Names
windows.description: List of colors used in legacy microsoft windows systems

french.title: French Colors
french.description: A list of French color names

spanish.title: Spanish Colors
spanish.description: A list of Spanish color names

german.title: German Colors
german.description: A list of German color names

x11.title: X11 Color Names
x11.description: Standard Xlib or the X11 protocol color names.

xkcd.title: XKCD Colors
xkcd.description: The 954 most common RGB monitor colors, as defined by several hundred thousand participants in the xkcd color name survey.

risograph.title: Risograph Colors
risograph.description: A list of popular colors for Risograph printers. Only includes colors with HEX, Pantone and Z-Type codes.

chineseTraditional.title: Traditional Colors of China
chineseTraditional.description: Traditional Colors of China: Color Aesthetics in the Forbidden City (中国传统色：故宫里的色彩美学) colors and their transliterations

default.title: Handpicked Color Names
default.description: A large hand-picked list of 30241 unique color names from various sources and thousands of curated user submissions.

bestOf.title: Best of Color Names
bestOf.description: Best color names selected from various sources.
